author: advitha
title: Konma WEB3 payment Solution
description: The ecosystem lacks a functional crypto payment system for an ADA payment gateway in e-commerce websites.
solution: Konma Labz plans to utilize ADA pay API for seamless checkout process with crypto payment gateway using Shelly Era Wallets on e-com sites.
experience: Built web2 functionality and the team is well versed in UI/UX development and API integrations.
